english: Kant and hegel have developed idealism .
chinese: 康德和黑格尔发展了唯心主义。

english: It is entirely proper to classify kant as a transcendental idealist .
chinese: 把康德化为先驱的唯心主义者是完全正确的。

english: This is a heated debate which involves materialist as opposed to idealist views .
chinese: 这是一场唯物主义与唯心主义的大论战。

english: The idealistic strain in western philosophy was carried to its highest pitch .
chinese: 西方哲学中的唯心主义倾向达到了其发展的顶峰。

english: Hegelian idealists subscribe to a general doctrine about the internality of relations .
chinese: 黑格尔唯心主义者赞同这种关于关系的内在性的一般学说。
唯心主义造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: They preach idealism whereas we advocate meterilsm
chinese: 他们讲唯心主义，我们讲唯物主义。

english: The rationalization of the long - term existence of idealism
chinese: 论哲学唯心主义长期存在的合理性

english: Materialists face truth , whereas idealists shun it
chinese: 唯物主义者面向真理,唯心主义者则逃避真理。

english: Preliminary opinion on the practical idealism
The historical certain of hegel practical idealism producing
chinese: 黑格尔实践唯心主义产生的历史必然性

english: Metaphysics is part and parcel of the idealist world outlook
chinese: 形而上学是唯心主义世界观的组成部分。

english: What magic and mentalism on television should look like
chinese: 什麽魔术和唯心主义的电视就应该是这个样子

english: I never appreciated idealism before . yet i can t accept it
chinese: 以前我从没有欣赏过唯心主义，尽管我仍然接受不了。

english: The innovation of philosophy - the double variation of idealism and materialism
chinese: 哲学创新是唯心主义和唯物主义的双重变奏
